articles.content: The way the world works these days is unbelievable, cracked a private equity firm exec to college prep coach William Rick Singer during a wiretapped call. The men were hashing out a plan to Photoshop… [+9240 chars]

articles.author: Ruth Kinane
articles.title: Watch Michelle Obama swerve Jimmy Kimmel's question about her and the former president's sex life - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: The former first lady joked that the late-night host was "obsessed" with the topic.
articles.content:
Michelle Obama is not here for Jimmy Kimmel's probing questions about her sex life.
On Tuesday night's episode of ABC's Jimmy Kimmel Live!, the former first lady stopped by, virtually, to chat about… [+1922 chars]
